document_title: Genital herpes: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_content: Herpes virus tends to hide (sleep) in nerve ganglia, so it is difficult to cure completely. Genital herpes virus rarely threatens the patient's life but is extremely dangerous for pregnant women. Genital Herpes virus outbreaks during pregnancy increase the risk of premature birth, the fetus may become infected or die in the womb. (4)
subsection_title: herpes sinh duc.json. How dangerous is genital herpes?
subsection_data:
herpes sinh duc.json. How dangerous is genital herpes?
Herpes virus tends to hide (sleep) in nerve ganglia, so it is difficult to cure completely. Genital herpes virus rarely threatens the patient's life but is extremely dangerous for pregnant women. Genital Herpes virus outbreaks during pregnancy increase the risk of premature birth, the fetus may become infected or die in the womb. (4)
